Source.Name: logrotate
Source.Summary: Rotates, compresses, removes and emails system log files
Source.Description: logrotate is designed to ease administration of systems that generate large numbers of log files. It allows automatic rotation, compression, removal, and emailing of log files.

Package.Name: logrotate
Package.Summary: Rotates, compresses, removes and emails system log files
Package.Description: logrotate is designed to ease administration of systems that generate large numbers of log files. It allows automatic rotation, compression, removal, and emailing of log files.
